quotes.message: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
quotes.name: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.message: Quitting is the easiest thing to do.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: You can always quit, so why quit now.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: When your own mind tells you to quit, you must ignore your negative thoughts and press on.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Strategic quitting is the secret of successful organizations
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: Failing is not the worst thing in the world; quitting is.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: It's always too early to quit.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.name: Ted Turner

quotes.message: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Most people who succeed in the face of seemingly impossible conditions are people who simply don't know how to quit.
quotes.name: Robert Schuller

quotes.message: A man is not finished when he is defeated. He is finished when he quits.
quotes.name: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.message: Quit now, you'll never make it. If you disregard this advice, you'll be halfway there.
quotes.name: David Zucker

quotes.message: Rest but never quit. Even the sun has a sinking spell each evening. But it always rises the next morning. At sunrise, every soul is born again.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: One of the most common causes of failure is the habit of quitting when one is overtaken by temporary defeat.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Never Quit.... Never ever Quit... You might feel weak when there is someone stronger and more skilled than you are, but if you don't quit there is a chance to prove your determination....
quotes.name: Swetha Dhanagari

quotes.message: Quitting is not the answer. Life is not fair, and you can't quit every time something unfair happens to you.
quotes.name: John Grisham

quotes.message: Quitting is a hiccup for losers. And down they go.
quotes.name: Lorenz Font

quotes.message: Of all the stratagems, to know when to quit is the best.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Success can be defined in many ways but failure in only one ...
quotes.name: Gerard de Marigny

quotes.message: Next time you want to quit, think who you want to be. Quitters never win.
quotes.name: Julie Hebert

quotes.message: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: The man who gives up accomplishes nothing and is only a hindrance. The man who does not give up can move mountains.
quotes.name: Ernest Hello

quotes.message: Things can always get worse, but only quitters quit!
quotes.name: Nina Sakura

quotes.message: Quitting is leading too.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quotes.name: Bear Bryant

quotes.message: The problem with self-improvement is knowing when to quit.
quotes.name: David Lee Roth

quotes.message: When faced with a mountain, I will not quit! I will keep on striving until I climb over, find a pass through, tunnel underneath - or simply stay and turn the mountain into a gold mine, with God's help!
quotes.name: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.message: Quit while you're ahead.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: The first time you quit, it's hard. The second time, it gets easier. The third time, you don't even have to think about it.
quotes.name: Bear Bryant

quotes.message: No one wants to quit when he's losing and no one wants to quit when he's winning.
quotes.name: Richard Petty

quotes.message: Fight the tendency to quit while you're behind.
quotes.name: Dave Weinbaum

quotes.message: Hard times ain't quit and we ain't quit.
quotes.name: Meridel Le Sueur

quotes.message: It's a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired, you quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.name: Robert Strauss

quotes.message: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation.
quotes.name: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.message: There's only one way you can fail, and that's to quit.
quotes.name: Brian Hays

quotes.message: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.name: Mike Ditka

quotes.message: I never tried quitting, and I never quit trying.
quotes.name: Dolly Parton

quotes.message: The difference in winning and losing is most often not quitting.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The best way to guarantee a loss is to quit.
quotes.name: Morgan Freeman

quotes.message: How am I to know what I can achieve if I quit?
quotes.name: Jason Bishop

quotes.message: I might lack in technicality, I might lack in strength, but there's no quit in me...I don't give up.
quotes.name: Dan Hardy

quotes.message: Quitting doesn't enter my mind.
quotes.name: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.message: The day I quit is the day I die.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you feel like quitting, remember why you started.
quotes.name: unknown
